Flow.description: Add opportunity to partner lead (if one is found)
Flow.label: Journey - Pass to Opportunity

fields.name: AE_Specification_Header
fields.fieldText:
AE Selection

It looks like this account doesn't yet have an AE on it. Please specify which AE this is being passed to (use the ChiliPiper handoff queues)

fields.name: Not_Journey_Owner
fields.fieldText:
You cannot pass this Journey to an Opportunity because you are not the Journey Owner.


Please claim the Contact record before passing this Journey to an Opportunity.

fields.name: Confirmation_Text
fields.fieldText:
Opportunity Created

Confirming that the Journey has been closed and passed to an Opportunity!

value.stringValue: [{"label":"I want to pass details to an existing Opp","value":"I want to pass details to an existing Opp","iconPosition":"left","variant":"neutral","iconName":"utility:record_update","index":0},{"label":"I want to create a new Opportunity","value":"I want to create a new Opportunity","iconPosition":"left","variant":"neutral","iconName":"utility:add","index":1}]
Do you want to add additional details to an existing Opp, or create a new Opportunity?

fields.name: DisplayTextExistingOpportunitiesHelp
fields.fieldText: Please reach out to the RevOps team (#revops_team) if you do not see the existing Opp that you're looking for.

fields.name: ROE
fields.fieldText: Learn more about SDR/AE qualification rules of engagement here

fields.name: Fast_Pass_Choice
fields.fieldText: Are you Fast Passing this to an Account Executive?

fields.name: contact_header
fields.fieldText: Meeting Contact Name: {!recordId.Contact__r.FirstName} {!recordId.Contact__r.LastName}

fields.name: fast_pass_enablement
fields.fieldText:
SDRs may route the first qualification call directly to an AE when:

  • The call includes a VP-level or higher prospect
  • Instructed to do so by sales leadership

fields.name: fast_pass_reason
fields.fieldText: Why are you Fast Passing this to an AE?

fields.name: Qual_Review_Header
fields.fieldText:
Qualification Review

Please ensure that the Qualification fields are completed accurately.

validationRule.errorMessage: Must be less than or equal to 128 characters

fields.name: Existing_Opp_Text
fields.fieldText: This Journey record is already associated with an Opportunity.

value.stringValue: Who should receive Sourced By Credit for this Opportunity?
